named-query.name: Operation.findAllOperationBeanByOperationDate
named-query.query: SELECT new ua.nike.project.hibernate.model.OperationBean(od.operationDate, p.surname, p.firstName, p.secondName, op.operationName, op.eye, od.surgeon, op.manager) FROM Operation op INNER JOIN op.operationDay od INNER JOIN op.patient p WHERE op.operationDay.operationDate = :operationDate
